scripts.version: node scripts/sync-version.js && git add aur/*/PKGBUILD specs/*.spec
scripts.build:miro: electron-builder --config electron-builder.miro.json --linux dir && node build-rpm.js miro
scripts.build:miro:all: electron-builder --config electron-builder.miro.json --linux AppImage deb dir && node build-rpm.js miro
scripts.build:notion: electron-builder --config electron-builder.notion.json --linux dir && node build-rpm.js notion
scripts.build:notion:all: electron-builder --config electron-builder.notion.json --linux AppImage deb dir && node build-rpm.js notion
scripts.build:claude-desktop: electron-builder --config electron-builder.claude.json --linux dir && node build-rpm.js claude-desktop
scripts.build:claude-desktop:all: electron-builder --config electron-builder.claude.json --linux AppImage deb dir && node build-rpm.js claude-desktop
scripts.build:all: npm run build:miro & npm run build:notion & npm run build:claude-desktop & wait
